conbody.p: A version is a variation or adaptation of the original T24 application. Versions save time for transaction input and maintenance, and expand the capabilities of applications that you use every day. In Design Studio, the Version Screen Designer customizes T24 application screens for a desired view.

Most T24 contract applications furnish business information for multiple products for E.g., LD.LOANS.AND.DEPOSITS support products like loans, deposits and commitments with options like discounts, maturity, liquidation, rollover and schedules. The LD.LOANS.AND.DEPOSITS application thereby has over 200 fields to furnish this vast information. Although all fields are necessary, only a few are needed for input and maintenance of a particular contract type. Version Screen Designer allows you to create version screens, presenting only the desired fields.

In addition to constructing a modified presentation of the T24 application with only the required fields, the designer provides you with functionality to default and modify values in the transaction fields, add local routines to perform business validations during the transaction life cycle, expose the version as a web method in a web service and more.
In design studio, T24 application customizations can be defined in the Screen Form of the version designer.
The tasks and reference sections will help you understand and effectively use the Version Designer.
